content:
Eric Rodriguez said:

can you try rw [...] { occs := occurrences.pos [x] } and try messing with x and see if that works?

This one didnt work, only rw [matrix.mul] {occs := occurrences.pos [1]}, did something, but the context was the same.

Eric Rodriguez said:

you can also try use conv to drill down to what you want

This worked well enough for my purposes, thanks!
Aron Erben has marked this topic as resolved.
